website_summaries.verdict: A potent combination of three  ingredients that help build the cushy cartilage that serves as a shock absorber for your joints.
pros: Each serving provides 750mg of glucosamine sulfate, 600mg of chondroitin sulfate, and 500mg of MSM
Many users reported also using for their dogs and had significant improvements
cons: Fairly large capsules to swallow and some reported difficulty with taking them

customer_reviews.title: great to prevent join pain
customer_reviews.text: Some people claim that most 'health' supplements do nothing, but I can say every time I've run out of a good glucosamine + chondroitin supplement for a week or so my knees start hurting again. I'm not sure if the MSM in this helps as well but as long as i maintain 2 x 2 daily I have zero joint pain ever so this is a keeper.
customer_reviews.author: Kalm Traveler

customer_reviews.title: After two knee surgeries and still terrible pain I bit the bullet and tried this
customer_reviews.text: After two knee surgeries and still terrible pain I bit the bullet and tried this. It has been one month and I am pain free. It's CRAZY! I keep telling myself it's coincidental but I truly believe I will use this the rest of my life!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Fenlon

customer_reviews.title: Doctor's best Glucosamine Chondroitin MSM, Joint support
customer_reviews.text: I used to have knee pain from arthritis, but after taking these capsules, I do not have the pain in my knee joints anymore. Be sure to give it at least 2 weeks to start to feel better. All I am saying is, don't give up on them working until you have give them plenty of time to take away the pain. It has been some time ago that i started the regiment of using them 2x a day. One in the morning and one in the evening.
customer_reviews.author: Eva

customer_reviews.title: I have to admit to being sceptical about this product ...
customer_reviews.text: I have to admit to being sceptical about this product, but after taking it as labeled for a couple of months, i have to admit that I DO notice an improvement in joint movement, and far less pain and discomfort than I had before I started taking it. I'll continue to take it, because it seems to work as advertixed!
customer_reviews.author: David Nagy

customer_reviews.text: Dislike the fact It recommends 4 a day. However it works wonders on my hip joints. I use to have a limp when I walked for years. The vet. Recommended it for my Collie with bad hips. I thought what have I got to loose I’ll buy it and try it. I have now been taking this product for 5 years and when I miss a week my limp comes back.

customer_reviews.title: Great supplement
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this supplement based on the success I've had giving glucosamine to my dogs, lol. The reviews for this product were very good and I have absolutely noticed a difference in my hips and knees since adding this. I take 4 capsules each night before bed and I no longer have that "hitch" in my step when I get up from a chair after sitting for a period of time. I've also noticed that I don't have as much pain in my knees after a lengthy tennis match. I'll be re-ordering when my initial bottle runs out in a couple of weeks.

customer_reviews.title: They Work For Me
customer_reviews.text: I am taking a bone building supplement for osteopenia which did not get rid of all of my hip and lower back pain but helped quite a bit. Then I added these to the mix and they helped relieve quite a bit more of the pain and stiffness. Been taking these for a few months now and I rarely feel my mobility is hampered at all any more. BRAVO! I am a 68 year old woman FYI.

product_meta.title: Doctor's Best Glucosamine Chondroitin Msm with optimsm, Supports Healthy Joint Structure, Function & Comfort, Non-GMO, Gluten Free, Soy Free, 360 caps
product_meta.description: Doctor's Best Glucosamine Chondroitin MSM provides three important nutrients which help support healthy joints: Glucosamine, Chondroitin and methylsulfonylmethane (MSM, from OptiMSM). Glucosamine Sulfate helps joint health for joint lubrication, better joint movement and flexibility.* proteoglycans contribute to the maintenance of sound joint structure, ultimately enhancing healthy joint function, mainly located on bones, near the joints and consists primarily of collagen protein with side chains called Chondroitin sulfate. Msm supplies bioavailable sulfur needed to support joint health, hair, skin, and nails. Optima is purified via distillation for highest purity and consistency and is an excellent source of bioavailable sulfur.*
feature_bullets: Doctor's Best Glucosamine/Chondroitin/MSM featuring OptiMSM supports joint structure, function and comfort
A potent combination of three proven, purified ingredients that help build the cushy cartilage that serves as a shock absorber for your joints
Each serving provides 750mg of glucosamine sulfate, 600mg of chondroitin sulfate, and 500mg of MSM

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
